title: #12: Big Bear Pow Day
description: It’s been an insane snow year in SoCal, the kind of season you may only see every ten years. At Bear Mountain, it’s almost been more about riding powder in the canyons than shredding one of the best parks in the world. In this Video Of The Week, Arbor mar
